      • withStartPosition

        public ChainedLogicalStreamBuilder withStartPosition(LogSequenceNumber lsn)
        从接口复制的说明: ChainedCommonStreamBuilder
        Specify start position from wich backend will start stream changes. If parameter will not specify, streaming starts from restart_lsn. For more details see pg_replication_slots description.
        指定者:
        withStartPosition 在接口中 ChainedCommonStreamBuilder<ChainedLogicalStreamBuilder>
        覆盖:
        withStartPosition 在类中 AbstractStreamBuilder<ChainedLogicalStreamBuilder>
        参数:
        lsn - not null position from which need start replicate changes
        返回:
        not null fluent

      • getSlotOptions

        public Properties getSlotOptions()
        从接口复制的说明: LogicalReplicationOptions
        Parameters for output plugin. Parameters will be set to output plugin that register for specified replication slot name.
        指定者:
        getSlotOptions 在接口中 LogicalReplicationOptions
        返回:
        list options that will be pass to output_plugin for that was create replication slot

      • getStatusInterval

        public int getStatusInterval()
        从接口复制的说明: CommonOptions
        Specifies the number of millisecond between status packets sent back to the server. This allows for easier monitoring of the progress from server. A value of zero disables the periodic status updates completely, although an update will still be sent when requested by the server, to avoid timeout disconnect. The default value is 10 seconds.
        指定者:
        getStatusInterval 在接口中 CommonOptions
        返回:
        the current status interval
